channel.title: Happiness on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in Happiness on un01s notes

item.title: happiness is an encounter
item.description: “Happiness is not something to be pursued, it is something met, an encounter. Most encounters, however, have a sequel; this is their promise. The encounter with happiness has no sequel. All is there instantly. Happiness is what pierces grief.” ―- John Berger
